title: Greener and whiter analytical method development and validation for determining the presence of zolpidem tartrate infused in apple juice using RP-HPLC via magnetic solid-phase extraction followed by LC-MS confirmatory analysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28168-28181
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04303K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Revathy Sundara Moorthy, G. Swetha, Rohini Rondla, Anren Hu, Narmada Vallakeerthi, P. Muralidhar Reddy
The research work entails a newly developed RP-HPLC method, aimedat analyzing the modern date rape drug, zolpidem tartrate (ZT), infused in apple juice matrix.
